sentences.english: The development of the embryo sac is Polygonum type with numberous antipodal cells.
sentences.chinese: 胚囊的发育为蓼型，具多个反足细胞。

sentences.english: OhjectiveTo study the anti - acute gastroenteritis effect of Nuerfeng Lialiao Water extract (NLWE) of mouse.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究牛耳枫与辣蓼提取物的抗急性胃肠炎的作用。

sentences.english: Study on raising seedling technology of polygonum capitatum.
sentences.chinese: 头花蓼种子育苗技术研究。

sentences.english: The development of embryo sacs of 'Ziyingui' belonged to polygonum type.
sentences.chinese: 籽银桂的胚囊发育类型为蓼型。

sentences.english: MethodsUVVIS spectrophotometry methods were used to determine the contents of the total flavone.
sentences.chinese: 紫外分光光度法测定了头花蓼中总黄酮的含量。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the anti-inflammatory action of Fengliao Changweikang Tablets(FCT).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨枫蓼肠胃康片的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: We had investigate the chemical constituents from herba Polygonum viviparum L.
sentences.chinese: 本文探讨了珠芽蓼全草的化学成分。

sentences.english: The chalazal megaspore of a linear tetrad develops into a polygonum type sac.
sentences.chinese: 四分体线行排列，合点端的大孢子发育为蓼型胚囊。

sentences.english: Objective To study on raising seedling technology of the Polygonum capitatum.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究头花蓼种子育苗技术。

sentences.english: Function megaspore is in the chalaza and the monosporic embryo sac is chenopodiad type.
sentences.chinese: 功能大孢子位于合点端，大孢子发育为蓼型胚囊。

sentences.english: The development of embryo sac belongs to polygonum type.
sentences.chinese: 东北龙胆的胚囊发育属于蓼型。

sentences.english: Larvae host plants Polygonum viviparum underground stem.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫的寄主植物为珠芽蓼的地下茎。

sentences.english: Polygonum orientale L. Seeds have low germination rate for the seed coats.
sentences.chinese: 红蓼种子由于种皮障碍，发芽率低。

sentences.english: Female gametophyte was polygonal embryo sac with 8 nucleis.
sentences.chinese: 雌配子体为八核七细胞蓼形胚囊。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the chemical constituents of Polygonum cuspidatum.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究蓼科植物虎杖的化学成分。
